name: Tsurupika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuruseko no Akashi
summary: Tsurupika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuruseko no Akashi is 2D platforming game released for the Famicom (NES) in 1991. The game is based on a Japanese children's manga and 58-episode anime series called Tsurupika Hagemaru (Little Baldy Hagemaru), and features many of its characters including protagonist Hagemaru whom the player controls.
